DOC.brief_title: PROFILE - Evaluation QoL PRO Outcomes Patients Taking Fingolimod
DOC.detailed_description: Multi centre , prospective , non interventional study 200-240 UK relapse remit multiple sclerosis patient assess change QoL PRO outcome measure baseline 12 month start fingolimod . Patients complete 4 questionnaire baseline ( prior first fingolimod dose ) , repeat 3 , 6 12 month interval via post .
